code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(_ref){let{onThemeChange,theme}=_ref;const handleThemeSwitch=()=>{const nextTheme=theme==='frog'?'christmas':theme==='christmas'?'halloween':'frog';onThemeChange(nextTheme);};const getIcon=()=>{if(theme==='frog')return'üê∏';if(theme==='christmas')return'üéÑ';if(theme==='halloween')return'üòà';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Ricky Rain Frog"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/dialog",children:"Dialog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cartoon",children:"Cartoon"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"theme-button-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"theme-button",onClick:handleThemeSwitch,children:getIcon()})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"shop-button-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/shop",className:"shop-button",children:"Take Ricky Home"})})]});}export default Navbar;
